name: And so he shall rise
description:
King Femi watched his mother from above.
He saw all of her questions.
He felt pity for her but a loving kind.
She knew not that he had passed on.
She knew not that he was in his chosen place.
He had been asked if he wanted to stay on the ground and he declined.
The pull to the next life was too strong.
He saw the flashes of his life.
The glorious battles.
The wrongs he did behind closed doors.
The good that he received no credit for.
He watched each chapter like an open book and made amends with all.
He sent a shower of rain to clear his mother from where she lay over his crumpled suit of skin and watched her look to the sky.
And with that moment he walked away, never to look back again.
